testcases.Name: Addition: -949 + 518
testcases.Body:
Test Name: Addition: -949 + 518

Preconditions:
- Calculator is launched
- Standard mode is selected
- Memory is cleared

Test Steps:
1. Enter -949
2. Press +
3. Enter 518
4. Press =

Expected Result:
- Display shows -431
